summary: A-ha is a popular Norwegian music group formed in 1982. They became famous in the 1980s with their hit songs like "Take On Me" and "The Sun Always Shines on T.V." from their first album, *Hunting High and Low*. The band took a break in the 1990s but reunited and continued making music. They've released many albums and performed at big events. A-ha is known for their success worldwide, selling over 100 million records, and holding the record for the largest paying rock concert audience.
title: A-ha
